fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Customs, Enlargement, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Customs Union regulations. Single market rules. Trade agreements and data on trade with 3rd parties. Future trade negotiations with the UK and 3rd party countries.
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication: EU Trade communications, all import/export related activites.
goals__remit:
The Channel Group is an independent think tank and consultancy firm 
established to champion Free Trade. 
 
We collaborate with leading thinkers to put forward a vision of international free trade, the breaking down of trade barriers and the ending of internal protectionist measures. Through rigorous independent research and insightful comment, The Channel Group informs debate and develops policy. 
 
Always conscious of practising what we peach, the Channel Group offers bespoke consultancy services for businesses seeking to access new and challenging markets. We have worked with businesses from around the world who are seeking to access markets in Europe, Africa and south-east Asia. 
 
The Channel Group was founded in 2015 by a group of individuals with experience in business, politics, law and finance. They came together to re-voice the arguments made by the early liberal pioneers of free trade in the 1800's.
